product_name: Coghlan's 8mm Stretch Cords with Hooks - Package of 2
long_description: These sturdy 20" long stretch cords with plastic-coated hooks on each end have dozens of uses--saves tying and untying and won't loosen in travel. These 20" long cords stretch to 40" long. Comes as a package of two.
short_description: These sturdy 20" long stretch cords with plastic-coated hooks on each end have dozens of uses--saves tying and untying and won't loosen in travel.
